channel.title: [PI] Desperate help needed!
channel.description:
I'm using PI and I tryed to portward my server with uTorrent, I had no-ip and uTorrent running and I was about to run the server but then came this error:
[code][14.11.2010 11:06]: Launching SoulSplit. [14.11.2010 11:06]: Made by Pim(ZRPS), Also credits to Sanity [14.11.2010 11:06]: Exception in thread "main" [14.11.2010 11:06]: java.net.Bind Exception: Address already in use: bind [14.11.2010 11:06]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [14.11.2010 11:06]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(ServerSocketC hannelImpl.java:119) [14.11.2010 11:06]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(ServerSocketAdapt or.java:59) [14.11.2010 11:06]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [14.11.2010 11:06]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [14.11.2010 11:06]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [14.11.2010 11:06]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [14.11.2010 11:06]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [14.11.2010 11:06]: Saving players... Jatka painamalla mitä tahansa näppäintä . . .[/code]
And it doesn't run :confused: :confused: I know uTorrent isn't the best way to portward but nothing else works for me, Please help! :(

item.title: [PI] Desperate help needed!
item.dc:creator: @Neruzycra Neruzycra
item.description:
@Neruzycra wrote:

fixed, thank you very much

item.title: [PI] Desperate help needed!
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

[quote=“Coolrick, post:4, topic:368680”]You got something running on the same port (43594)[/quote]Way to point out what was already said.

P.S. Not all servers run on port 43594.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Desperate help needed!
item.dc:creator: @Coolrick Coolrick
item.description:
@Coolrick wrote:

You got something running on the same port (43594)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Desperate help needed!
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

The error is saying it cannot bind to port.

This is due to the fact that you have uTorrent running, which uses the ports.

You need to run the server before you run uTorrent.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Desperate help needed!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Not too sure, but I’d read that.

[14.11.2010 11:06]: Exception in thread "main" [14.11.2010 11:06]: java.net.Bind Exception: [b]Address already in use: bind[/b]

Read full topic
